LanguageData.Bamboomaker.label: bamboomaker
LanguageData.Bamboomaker.description: A slow, bumbling caste of dryad which specializes in bamboo production. Together with its Gauranlen tree, this dryad can generate a bamboo-like material on an ongoing basis. However, it is slow and ineffective at work or combat.
LanguageData.IronWoodmaker.label: ironwoodmaker
LanguageData.IronWoodmaker.description: A slow, bumbling caste of dryad which specializes in ironwood production. Together with its Gauranlen tree, this dryad can generate a ironwood-like material on an ongoing basis. However, it is slow and ineffective at work or combat.
